snippet.title: Stealth Bastard Deluxe - The Teleporter Chambers DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
Stealth Bastard Deluxe - The Teleporter Chambers DLC now available on Steam!

Some days, life as a working clone starts to get you down. A daily grind that sometimes quite literally involves the grinding of your limbs and organs between whirring blades can start to feel like a real drag. Faced with a rat race in a maze that contains horrible death instead of tasty cheese, don't you sometimes just wish that you could be... somewhere else?

Well now you can! With the new Teleporter Chambers DLC level pack for Stealth Bastard Deluxe, you can be in as many places as you like -- simultaneously! Just pick up a teleporter from a handy nearby vending machine and disappear in front of your robotic antagonist's very eyes! Or sensors, or whatever those things have.

As well as 20 new levels, the Teleporter Chambers DLC level pack comes with six new achievements and unlocks the vending machine item in the level editor.

The Teleporter Chambers are now available on Steam priced £1.99/$2.99/€2.49.
